name: House Horrors
description:
House Horrors is a horror game in which a group of people  Al, Bart and Siri struggle to navigate throuch a death trap.  They are searching for their friend Jimmy who invited them there.

There are 3 resources that can effect the game.

1.Health: if any member's health reaches zero you lose

2.Stress: if the group stress goes too high you lose

3. Morale: moral is what you need to find your way out.

Game created for Mashup Jam

Key bindings:

press B to reposition if you get knocked down other then that

Movement is WASD

click with the Mouse on Events

Features for the Future

1.Distinct colors for choices (completed, available in vers 1.1+ a few extra events)

2. Personalized health modifiers

3. Give me feedback in regards of what other features should I add

4. MAC version and WebGL version planned.(Test version(1.1) for Mac is available(1.0) is not available for Mac , WebGL has been postponed).
